attributes.action: Alter the UK Time to Single/Double Summertime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Giving us lighter evenings in the Winter, and daylight far into the evenings in the Summer will be good for both the sprit and economy of the UK.
The simplest way to implement this is to not change the clocks in October. This will help business by aligned us with our European colleagues, and with the extended light evenings in the Summer give all our Tourist and Outdoor Event places a huge boost.

Maybe best of all will be the uplift to the people living here in our country.

You may wish to consider letting Scotland decide separately whether they wish to follow our lead.

See the RSPOA website for details on the life saving and safety aspects.
